spell.forcemaster_rpg.straight_punch.des: Powerful punch, that deals {damage} physical damage, weakens the target.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.stonehand.name: Stonehand
spell.forcemaster_rpg.stonehand.descript: Gives caster the Stonehand-Effect for{effect_duration} seconds. Chance to stun targets on knuckle-attacks.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.asal.name: Asalraalaikum
spell.forcemaster_rpg.asal.description: Concentrated strike, deals {damage}_1 arcane- and {damage}_2 physical-damage, exhausts the caster.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.barq_esna.name: Baraqijal Esna
spell.forcemaster_rpg.barq_esna.descript: Makes target vulnerable to arcane-damage, weakens its damage & higher chance to crit on target.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.burstcrack.name: Burst Crack
spell.forcemaster_rpg.burstcrack.descrip: Smashes the ground hard, dealing {damage} physical-damage and knock up targets.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.belial_smashing.de: Charges to direction, knocking up targets and dealing {damage} physical-damage.
spell.forcemaster_rpg.sonichand.name: Sonichand
spell.forcemaster_rpg.sonichand.descript: Punches continuously in the air creating vacuum, deals {damage}_1 arcane- and {damage}_2 physical-damage
spell.forcemaster_rpg.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.forcemaster_rpg.arcane_blast.descr: Charging up blasts, piercing thru {pierce} targets, dealing {damage} arcane-damage.
